required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Tolerability Study in Severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Tolerability Study of Symbicort Turbuhaler(160/4.5µg/Inhalation,2inhalations Twice Daily) Added to Atrovent (20µg/Inhalation, 2 Inhalations 4 Times Daily)+Theophylline SR(0.1g/Tablet,1 Tablet p.o. Twice Daily) Compared With Atrovent+Theophylline SR in Severe COPD Patients.

brief_summary.textblock: Efficacy and tolerability study in severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) patients.

detailed_description.textblock: Efficacy and tolerability study of Symbicort Turbuhaler (160/4.5µg/inhalation,2inhalations twice daily) added to Atrovent (20µg/inhalation, 2 inhalations 4 times daily) + theophylline SR(0.1g/tablet, 1 tablet p.o. twice daily) compared with Atrovent + theophylline SR in severe COPD patients.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (week 0) and mean in treatment period (weeks 1, 6, 12) measured before inhalation of study drug
primary_outcome.description: Ratio of pre-dose FEV1 (Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second) in treatment period to baseline value

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose FEV1 at 5 Minutes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (-2 weeks) and mean in treatment period (1, 6, 12 weeks) measured at 5 minutes after inhalation of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: Ratio of post-dose FEV1 at 5 minutes to baseline value

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose FEV1 at 60 Minutes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (meaured before inhalation of study drug at week 0) and mean in treatment period (measured at 1 hour after inhalation of study drug at weeks 0, 1, 6, 12)
secondary_outcome.description: Ratio of post-dose FEV1 at 60 minutes to baseline value

secondary_outcome.measure: Pre-dose FVC
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (meaured before inhalation of study drug at week 0) and mean in treatment period (measured at 1 hour after inhalation of study drug at weeks 0, 1, 6, 12)
secondary_outcome.description: Ratio of pre-dose FVC (Forced Vital Capacity) to baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose FVC at 5 Minutes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (meaured before inhalation of study drug at week 0) and mean in treatment period (measured at 5 minutes after inhalation of study drug at weeks 0, 1, 6, 12)
secondary_outcome.description: Ratio of post-dose FVC at 5 minutes to baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose FVC at 60 Minutes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (meaured before inhalation of study drug at week 0) and mean in treatment period (measured at 1 hour after inhalation of study drug at weeks 0, 1, 6, 12)
secondary_outcome.description: Ratio of post-dose FVC at 60 minutes to baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Pre-dose IC
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (meaured before inhalation of study drug at week 0) and mean in treatment period (measured at 1 hour after inhalation of study drug at weeks 0, 1, 6, 12)
secondary_outcome.description: Ratio of pre-dose IC (Inspiratory Capacity) to baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose IC at 60 Minutes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (meaured before inhalation of study drug at week 0) and mean in treatment period (measured at 1 hour after inhalation of study drug at weeks 0, 1, 6, 12)
secondary_outcome.description: Ratio of post-dose IC at 60 minutes to baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Pre-dose PEF in Last Week of Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured before inhalation of study drug in the last week of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in pre-dose morning PEF (Peak Expiratory Flow) from run-in period to last week of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Pre-dose PEF in First Week of Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurments measured before inhalation of study drug in the first week of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in pre-dose morning PEF from run-in period to first week of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Pre-dose PEF in Whole Treatment Period
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured before inhalation of study drug in whole treatment period (12 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in pre-dose morning PEF from run-in period to whole treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose PEF in Last Week of Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured at 5 minutes after inhalation of study drug in the last week of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in post-dose morning PEF at 5 minutes from run-period to last week of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose PEF in First Week of Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurments measured at 5 minutes after inhalation of study drug in the first week of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in post-dose morning PEF at 5 minutes from run-in period to first week of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose PEF in Whole Treatment Period
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured at 5 minutes after inhalation of study drug in whole treatment period (12 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in post-dose morning PEF at 5 minutes from run-period to whole treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Use of Reliever Medication During Day in the Last Week on Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured during day in the last week on treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in the number of inhalations of reliever medication during day from run-in to the last week on treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Use of Reliever Medication During Day in the First Week on Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured during day in the first week on treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in the number of inhalations of reliever medication during day from run-in to the first week on treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Use of Reliever Medication During Day in the Whole Treatment Period
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured during day in the whole treatment period (12 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in the number of inhalations of reliever medication during day from run-in to the whole treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in COPD Symptoms - Breathing
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements in the whole treatment period (12 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in breathing symptom score (from 0 (none) to 4 (severe)) from run-in period

secondary_outcome.measure: COPD Symptoms - Cough
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements in the whole treatment period (12 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in cough symptom score (from 0 (none) to 4 (almost constant)) from run-in period

secondary_outcome.measure: COPD Symptoms Sputum
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements in the whole treatment period (12 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in sputum symptom score (from 0 (none) to 4 (severe)) from run-in period

secondary_outcome.measure: COPD Exacerbations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Whole treatment period (12 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Severe exacerbations requiring systemic steroids (oral ≥3 days or parenteral) or hospitalisation or emergency room treatment due to worsening of COPD symptoms

secondary_outcome.measure: Use of Reliever Medication During Night in the Last Week on Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured during night in the last week on treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in the number of inhalations of reliever medication during day from run-in to the whole treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Use of Reliever Medication During Night in the First Week on Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured during night in the first week on treatment
secondary_outcome.description: change in the number of inhalations of reliever medication during day from run-in to the first week on treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Use of Reliever Medication During Night in the Whole Treatment Period
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured during night in the whole treatment period (12 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in the number of inhalations of reliever medication during day from run-in to the whole treatment period

arm_group.description: budesonide/formoterol (Symbicort Turbuhaler 160/4.5µg/inhalation, 2 inhalations twice daily) added to ipratropium (AtroventTM 20 µg/inhalation, 2 inhalations four times daily) + theophylline SR (0.1g/tablet, 1 tablet p.o. twice daily)
ipratropium (AtroventTM 20 µg/inhalation, 2 inhalations four times daily) + theophylline SR (0.1g/tablet, 1 tablet p.o. twice daily)

intervention.description: ipratropium (AtroventTM 20 µg/inhalation, 2 inhalations four times daily)
theophylline SR (0.1g/tablet, 1 tablet p.o. twice daily)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Signed and dated informed consent
- Men or women patients ≥ 40 years of age
- Diagnosis of COPD with symptoms for more than 2 years and there is a history of at least one COPD exacerbation requiring a course of oral steroids and/or antibiotics within 1-12 months before Visit 2
- Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (FEV1) ≤50% of predicted normal value, pre-bronchodilator and Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (FEV1) / Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) < 70%, pre-bronchodilator
- Total symptom score of 2 or more per day for at least half of run-in period (breathing, cough and sputum scores from the diary card) and complete morning recordings of Digital Peak Flow Meter data at least 7 out of the last 10 days of the run-in period
Exclusion Criteria:
- A history of asthma and seasonal allergic rhinitis before 40 years of age
- Patients who have experienced exacerbation of COPD requiring hospitalisation and /or emergency room treatment and/or a course of oral steroids and/or intravenous corticosteroids and/or antibiotics within 4 weeks prior to Visit 2 and/or during run-in period
- Patients with relevant cardiovascular disorder judged by the investigator
- Patients with glaucoma, prostatic hyperplasia or bladder-neck obstruction judged by the investigator
- Women who are pregnant, breast-feeding or of child-bearing potential judged by the investigator

clinical_study.keyword: Severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) patients

group.title: Symbicort Turbuhaler + Ipratropium + Theophylline SR
group.description: Symbicort Turbuhaler 160/4.5μg/inhalation, 2 inhalations twice daily) added to ipratropium (AtroventTM 20 μg/inhalation, 2 inhalations four times daily) + theophylline SR (0.1g/tablet, 1 tablet p.o. twice daily)

group.title: Ipratropium + Theophylline SR
group.description: ipratropium (AtroventTM 20 μg/inhalation, 2 inhalations four times daily) + theophylline SR (0.1g/tablet, 1 tablet p.o. twice daily)

participants_list.participants: Efficacy analysis used 290 patients. Safety analysis used 290+3=293 patients.
Efficacy analysis used 292 patients. Safety analysis used 292-3=289 patients.

baseline.population: Two patients in 'Symbicort Turbuhaler + ipratropium + theophylline' group did not receive study treatment and were excluded from the analysis popolation. Thus the number of patients in that group is 290 (= 290 - 2).

group.title: Symbicort Turbuhaler + Ipratropium + Theophylline SR
group.description: Symbicort Turbuhaler 160/4.5μg/inhalation, 2 inhalations twice daily) added to ipratropium (AtroventTM 20 μg/inhalation, 2 inhalations four times daily) + theophylline SR (0.1g/tablet, 1 tablet p.o. twice daily)

outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured during day in the last week on treatment

group.title: Symbicort Turbuhaler + Ipratropium + Theophylline SR
group.description: Symbicort Turbuhaler 160/4.5μg/inhalation, 2 inhalations twice daily) added to ipratropium (AtroventTM 20 μg/inhalation, 2 inhalations four times daily) + theophylline SR (0.1g/tablet, 1 tablet p.o. twice daily)

group.title: Ipratropium + Theophylline SR
group.description: ipratropium (AtroventTM 20 μg/inhalation, 2 inhalations four times daily) + theophylline SR (0.1g/tablet, 1 tablet p.o. twice daily)

measure.title: Use of Reliever Medication During Day in the Last Week on Treatment
measure.description: Change in the number of inhalations of reliever medication during day from run-in to the last week on treatment

analysis.method_desc: Additive ANCOVA model with treatment and centre as fixed factors and the run-in mean of reliever medication as a covariate

outcome.title: Use of Reliever Medication During Day in the First Week on Treatment

outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured during day in the whole treatment period (12 weeks)

outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements in the whole treatment period (12 weeks)

outcome.title: COPD Exacerbations
outcome.description: Severe exacerbations requiring systemic steroids (oral ≥3 days or parenteral) or hospitalisation or emergency room treatment due to worsening of COPD symptoms
outcome.time_frame: Whole treatment period (12 weeks)

group.title: Symbicort Turbuhaler + Ipratropium + Theophylline SR
group.description: Symbicort Turbuhaler 160/4.5μg/inhalation, 2 inhalations twice daily) added to ipratropium (AtroventTM 20 μg/inhalation, 2 inhalations four times daily) + theophylline SR (0.1g/tablet, 1 tablet p.o. twice daily)

measure.title: COPD Exacerbations
measure.description: Severe exacerbations requiring systemic steroids (oral ≥3 days or parenteral) or hospitalisation or emergency room treatment due to worsening of COPD symptoms

analysis.method_desc: Poisson regression model with treatment as a factor and the duration time in study as an offset variable

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: PI shall not publish any results until the earlier of (i) the date of the first Study results publication authorized by AZ and (ii) the end of the 18 month period following the completion of the Study. PI shall provide AZ with such material for review, at least 60 days prior to submission for publication. If requested in writing by AZ, PI shall withhold material from submission for publication for an additional 90 days from the date of AZ's request.
